long_description: The Mountainsmith Kinetic TLS waistpack is made with recycled materials, and stashes the hiking, travel and fitness essentials that you can't imagine leaving behind. Breathable hipbelt and and ergonomic fit enhance comfort for long hours of wear. Main compartment features a key clip; bright yellow lining increases internal visibility. Fleece-lined front pocket fits a smart phone or MP3 player and features a headphone cord port. 2 side mesh bottle pockets fit water bottles up to 22 fl. oz. Elastic bungee attachment secures gloves or a hat; reflective highlights on the bungee and cord loops enhance visibility in low light. The Mountainsmith Kinetic TLS waistpack is made with 100% recycled PET body fabric and high-tenacity nylon in key wear areas.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Kinetic TLS waistpack is made with recycled materials, and stashes the hiking, travel and fitness essentials that you can't imagine leaving behind.
